title: player build gone from match history :(
body: just checked my latest game and the build is gone from the match. I don't see why they'd remove it, other that it was taking too much resources. I found it was useful, it there any chance of seing it back ?

replies.body: It's missing on my matches too :(

I have noticed it gone since patch 5.1, I hope it's a bug and isnt removed forever.  It's the only thing I have left after a defeat to try to understand why.

Note: its not the html coding, matches from BEFORE the patch still have it.
Nah its missing for me too, id say its a problem with the actual html coding not linking the image and image map correctly.
